pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bazaar (``bzr``) is a decentralized revision control system, designed to be easy for developers and end users alike. Bazaar is part of the GNU project to develop a complete free operating system. Bazaar was formerly known as Bazaar-NG. It's the successor to ``baz``, a fork of GNU arch, but shares no code. (To upgrade from Baz, use the ``baz-import`` command in the bzrtools plugin.)
